rules_text:
When Guardian of the Grove enters the battlefield, create a Glamour token. [i](It’s a colorless enchantment token with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
{X}{G}, {T}: Until end of turn, each noncreature, non-Aura enchantment you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature.
